sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './PrivacyPolicy.css'; export default function PrivacyPolicy() { return (

Privacy Policy

At Gen AI Editor, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle data and what we do to ensure your privacy.

1. Data Collection

We collect minimal user data, only when absolutely necessary. For example, we may collect:

  • Email address (for contact or feedback forms)
  • Uploaded images/videos (for processing only, not for storage)
  • Browser information (for improving UI/UX experience)

2. Data Usage

Your data is used solely to provide you with AI editing features. We do not sell, rent, or share your data with any third parties.

3. Data Retention

All uploaded files (photos/videos) are deleted from our servers after processing is completed. We do not store your content.

4. Third-party Services

We may use secure third-party services (like cloud storage or analytics) to enhance performance. These services comply with standard privacy laws (e.g., GDPR).

5. Security

We take strong measures to secure your data during upload, processing, and deletion. HTTPS and file isolation practices are enforced throughout.

6. User Rights

You have the right to request deletion of any personal data, or ask questions by contacting our support team via the Contact page.

7. Policy Updates

This policy may change as our services evolve. All updates will be reflected on this page with a revised date.

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

); }
